scripts.start: npm run watch dev & live-server public --no-browser -q
scripts.dev: rm -fR .tmp; mkdir -p .tmp; cp -a components/Resources/. .tmp; cp -a site/. .tmp;NODE_ENV=development npm run --prefix components/Styling publish -- --output-filename ../../.tmp/js/main.js; rm -R public; cp -R .tmp public
scripts.build: rm -fR .public; cp -a components/Resources/. public; cp -a site/. public;NODE_ENV=production npm run --prefix components/Styling publish -- --output-filename ../../public/js/main.js
